title: MOOC-Based Mathematics Instructional Design Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematics Education Theory and Experience with Digital Educational Tools
context.additional_context: A mixed-methods study analyzing Spanish MOOC cases to research platform-specific instructional design patterns and applying them to mathematics education.

learning_goals: Analyze and evaluate the five core instructional design elements of MOOCs (learning structure, activity types, resource utilization, interaction methods, and assessment systems) with over 80% accuracy
Compare MOOC design variations based on platform characteristics to establish optimal strategies aligned with mathematics education objectives
Demonstrate competency in developing instructional design metrics through project deliverables based on actual MOOC case studies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
